name: Give and Grow
description:
You are a slime and need to touch each dirt tile in each level to make them grow and continue to the next level. Collect Golden Mushrooms if you want to show off your skills.

This is a simple game made for the GoGodot Game Jam with the theme of Growth. This game is still in development and will soon have more levels and better asthetics.

The credits for the music and some of the assets are in the credits section in the game. I didn't realize I couldn't use outside music for my game, but its there.

Also, if you are on Lvl 3, push your player's body against the side of the platform outside of the visable screen to go to him. He has vital information on a new way of jumping higher. You won't be able to complete lvl 5 unless you talk to him.

Thanks!
